metadata.Title: CVE-2019-13010 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in GitLab Enterprise Edition 8.3 through 12.0.2.The color codes decoder was vulnerable to a resource depletion attack ifspecific formats were used. It allows Uncontrolled Resource Consumption.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
